DOC.brief_summary: This study 12-week open-label trial ass effectiveness Omega-3 fatty acid deficient emotional self-regulation ( DESR ) supplement ADHD treatment child adolescent Attention Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder . Subjects age 6-17 currently medication Attention Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder still experience DESR trait .
DOC.criteria: Male female child age 617 year Living home A diagnosis ADHD ( inattentive , hyperactive/impulsive , combine type ) accord Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fifth Edition ( DSMV ) base clinical assessment Having score outside normal ( Tscore 60 great ) Emotional Control subscale Behavior Rating Inventory Executive Function ( parentreport version ) score outside normal range ( cumulative 180 great ) Anxious/Depressed , Attention Problems , Aggressive Behavior subscales Child Behavior Checklist age ( 618 ) Currently FDA approve traditional stimulant medication ( Concerta Adderall XR ) nonstimulant medication ( Strattera Tenex ) ADHD least one month Beings able come weekly/monthly study visit 12 week Having parent guardian level understand study Having unstable medical illness determine clinician investigator Having current diagnosis schizophrenia bipolar disorder Having delusion hallucination Having bleed disorder Taking ongoing nonADHD psychotropic medication stable , effective serotonin reuptake inhibitor fluoxetine ( Prozac ) , citalopram ( Celexa ) medication use asneeded basis Pregnant nursing female IQ < 70 previous test judged clinician investigator Illegal substance use Investigator his/her immediate family ; define investigator 's spouse , parent , child , grandparent , grandchild Presence suicidal risk , homicidality Unwilling/unable comply study procedure Allergies fish shellfish omega 3 fish oil ; multiple adverse drug reaction Poor command English language
